fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces

Interface ParentNotificationI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CoordinatorI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoordinationEngine, CoordinationRTEngine

    public interface ParentNotificationI
    The interface ParentNotificationI declares the methods used by child models to notify their parent models about the processing of external events.

    Description

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2018-06-01

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void hasPerformedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
      notify the pa rent model that the child model modelURI has performed its current external events; used when a coupled model has its children models perform the external events sent by other models among its children and need not be called upon its external event step method anymore.
      void hasReceivedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
      notify the parent model that the model modelURI has received some external events during the execution of another model internal step and therefore that it will need to perform an external step during the current simulation step.

    • Method Detail

      • hasReceivedExternalEvents

        void hasReceivedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
        notify the parent model that the model modelURI has received some external events during the execution of another model internal step and therefore that it will need to perform an external step during the current simulation step.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - the URI of a submodel that has received some external events.

      • hasPerformedExternalEvents

        void hasPerformedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
        notify the pa rent model that the child model modelURI has performed its current external events; used when a coupled model has its children models perform the external events sent by other models among its children and need not be called upon its external event step method anymore.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - the URI of a submodel that has performed its current external events.
